description: User registration logic requires the User and UserToken database schema to be in place.
mitigation_plan: Task is assigned to the same sprint and sequenced correctly.

description: The frontend registration form depends on the backend API contract being defined and available (even if mocked).
mitigation_plan: Define API contract in OpenAPI/GraphQL schema early. Frontend can develop against a mock server.

description: Frontend session refresh logic depends on the backend login and refresh endpoints being functional.
mitigation_plan: Backend to provide a stable dev endpoint early in the sprint.

description: The JWT guard's blocklist check requires the logout logic (which populates the blocklist) to be implemented first.
impact_if_delayed: Logout functionality would be incomplete and insecure.

description: The frontend profile editing UI depends on the backend GraphQL API for fetching and updating profile data.
mitigation_plan: Define GraphQL schema early. Frontend can build with mock data.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all profile management UI development.
